link_type.name: link_type
link_type.description: The type of links that shall be included in the map.
link_type.validation_error_text: CGI input parameter link_type does not match pattern /^(openflow|mpls)$/

workgroup_id.name: workgroup_id
workgroup_id.description: The workgroup ID that the user is currently participating in.
workgroup_id.validation_error_text: Parameter workgroup_id only accepts integer numbers.

name: get_maps
description: returns a JSON object representing the network layout
